description: Golden values for KeyDriver module regression test

checks.name: rank_product_quality

integration_notes: Mock uses simple linear regression for driver importance
Relative importance calculated from standardized beta weights
All drivers have high correlations (data is synthetic)
Real module may use Shapley values, relative weights, or other methods
